price: Čovjek je stvoren od žurbe. Pokazat ću Ja vama, doista, dokaze Svoje, zato Me ne požurujte!
arabic: خُلِقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِنۡ عَجَلٖۚ سَأُوْرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِي فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khuliqa al-insānu min ʿajalin sa-urīkum āyātī falā tastaʿjilūni
